Text: I'm sorry, I left off Season 3 episode 11.
Thanks, but ugh - wish you hadn't RAR'ed it.
Sorry, it is my first up.  I will keep that in mind for the next one.

Ditto on the RAR. It only defeats the whole purpose of BitTorrent. If it's not RARed, I can pick-and-choose which files I want from the torrent. With a RAR, I have to grab the whole thing just to get 1 file out of it.
